post.author: 이계영
post.content:
Hi James, I work with the Keith Bagg Group as a Consultant. You had submitted your resume to us in the past. I understand that you are currently involved in an assignment. I have a contract available which is a 3 to 6 month to start with a likelihood of going to 1 year. My client is looking for a Java GUI Developer. Could you perhaps recommend any friends or colleagues who have experience with the items below? Any help is appreciated.
Joe Minaudo Technology Staffing Consultant email: joe@kbits.com Phone: (416) 863-0154 ext.215 Toll Free: (800) 493-JOBS (5627) Direct Fax: (416) 350-9631
· JSP · HTML · JavaScript · Struts · Eclipse · CVS · Dreamweaver · Experience with single sign-on and session management in a J2EE web application is desired..
post.title: Contract position
